instruction: Use UML to design all Data Structure for

instances.output:
Sure! Here is an UML diagram representing the data structures for Animation and Comics - Payment:                                       +----------------------+
                                      |        Payment       |
                                      +----------------------+
                                      | -id: int             |
                                      | -amount: float       |
                                      | -status: PaymentStatus|
                                      | -timestamp: datetime |
                                      +----------------------+

+--------------------------+          +-----------------------+
|        PaymentStatus     |          |       PaymentMethod    |
+--------------------------+          +-----------------------+
| -status: string          |          | -method: string        |
| +PENDING: PaymentStatus  |          | +CREDIT_CARD: string   |
| +COMPLETED: PaymentStatus|          | +PAYPAL: string        |
| +FAILED: PaymentStatus   |          +-----------------------+
+--------------------------+
